branchCategory.name: C(D)Q2Y-Z, Smooth Air Cylinder, Low Friction, Low Speed, Double Acting
branchCategory.description: Smooth acting standard double acting, single rod version of the CQ2 compact cylinder is for low speed and low pressure applications. The CQ2 is available in bore sizes from 32mm to 100mm. It comes standard with male or female piston rod threads. It is possible to mount auto switches on any of the 4 surfaces.
